input.sentences: i went on a road trip last week .
i stopped by a small town .
there were not many people out .
some of the houses were very big .
output.sentences: It is the end of the week and now it is time for the road trip
We needed some gas so we stopped at the next town
We added around 10$ of gas to continue our trip
We passed several small town with few people living there
We finally arrived to our friend place, in the middle of beautiful houses
